meanings.sent1: The rabbit fled from the fox.
meanings.sent2: She quickly fled the scene of the accident.
meanings.sent3: The butterfly fled the garden party when it started raining.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her past mistakes constantly fled through her mind.
meanings.sent5: The children fled the classroom when the fire alarm rang.

meanings.definition: ran away from a place of danger
meanings.sent1: The deer fled into the forest when it heard the hunter's footsteps.
meanings.sent2: The villagers fled their homes during the flood.
meanings.sent3: The cat fled from the vacuum cleaner as if it were a fierce predator.
meanings.sent4: The students fled the cafeteria when the food fight broke out.
meanings.sent5: The birds fled the tree as the storm approached.

meanings.sent1: She fled down the street, trying to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: The thief fled swiftly from the scene of the crime.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel fled up the tree to avoid the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: The secret agent fled silently into the night.
meanings.sent5: The cat fled gracefully across the garden, chasing a butterfly.
